mention.text: The aged phantoms in their bloodstained dress
Glory and honour , wrath and righteousness
Vultures that fill the world with ravenous
the crucified their sure relief , Deeper and deeper grows the ancient grief , Blackest of all intolerable things
thou still the saviour of mankind
